synopsis.text: Music unites people and eras, creating a timeless connection. This May, witness a new beginning as the top male idol groups gather for the 'BLACK or WHITE LIVE SHOWDOWN'! The dream concert features the diverse talents of IDOLiSH7, TRIGGER, Re:vale, and ŹOOĻ, each bringing their unique charm to the stage. Brace yourself for an extraordinary live entertainment experience that transcends time and captures hearts, as these idols aim to create a beloved and unforgettable performance.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
